high_descs: Go right and then turn to the left to face the end of the desk.
Pick the disc up from the desk.
Go left and then left again to stand in front of the night stand to the right of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a disc and turn a lamp on.

high_descs: Turn to your right and go across the room to the left side of the desk.
Pick up the CD on the desk, to the left of the black cup.
Turn to your left and walk to the rug on the floor, then turn right and go to the night stand between the wall and the bed.
Place the CD in the top drawer of the night stand.
anns.task_desc: Put the CD in the night stand.

high_descs: Walk to the computer table on your right.
Grab the CD off the table.
Go to the nightstand with the lamp on it.
anns.task_desc: Look at a CD with a lamp's light.
